meanings.sent1: She is demoing the new software to the team.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys demoing his painting skills at the art show.
meanings.sent3: The robot kept demoing its dance moves, much to everyone's delight.
meanings.sent4: The magician was demoing his tricks with such precision.
meanings.sent5: The teacher demoing the experiment made it easy to understand.

meanings.sent1: The construction crew is demoing the old building to make space for a new one.
meanings.sent2: The wrecking ball is demoing the abandoned house.
meanings.sent3: The kids were demoing the sandcastle they built at the beach.
meanings.sent4: The storm was demoing everything in its path.
meanings.sent5: The bulldozer was demoing the obstacles in its way.
